name: CreateErrorTrackingAssignmentRule
description:
Create a new error tracking assignment rule.

Use this tool to create a new error tracking assignment rule for specific environments. It is useful for managing error tracking configurations in a project environment.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: ID of the project to access. Retrieve via /api/projects/ call.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: rule_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the error tracking assignment rule to be created.

parameters.name: assignment_rule_filters
parameters.description: Filters to specify the criteria for the error tracking assignment rule. Input as a string.

parameters.name: assignee_username
parameters.description: Username of the individual to whom the error tracking assignment rule is assigned. This should be a valid username within the project.

parameters.name: order_key_priority
parameters.description: An integer specifying the priority order of the rule. Lower values imply higher priority.

parameters.name: disabled_data_state
parameters.description: Indicates if data for the error tracking rule is disabled. Use 'true' to disable, 'false' to enable.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
